author: SFGate - Amy Graff
title: Winter storm warning issued for California's Sierra: 'Travel is highly discouraged' | Flipboard
text: Winter storm warning issued for California's Sierra: 'Travel is highly discouraged' The National Weather Service sounded the alarm bells Thursday, calling on people to avoid traveling to and from California’s Sierra Nevada this weekend as a storm is expected to bring periods of heavy snow.
